description: fragm. (bāb al-masḥ ʻalá al-khuffayn - bāb kayfīyat al-qatl). ff. 105. 270 x 201; 210 x 140 mm. 26 lin. 15th cen. Commentary on the work of Abū Jaʻfar al-Ṭaḥāwī, d. 321/833: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 181 (no. 6, commentary 6); S I, 294.
